name: 创建公会
text: Today, {0} created {1}, marking the rise of a new star.

name: 加入公会
text: {0} joined our Guild as another valuable member.

name: 离开公会
text: All good things must come to an end. {0} left the Guild.

name: 会长变更
text: Guild management change: {0} becomes the new Guild Master.

name: 弹劾会长
text: With the Master {0} unable to carry out administrative duties, {1} initiated the impeachment process to take over the role. Following a 2-day probation, {1} has become the new Master.
